Song.title: More Love to Thee
Song.copyright: Elizabeth P. Prentiss | Fernando Ortega | William Howard Doane Â© 2004 Curb Songs, Cerdo Verde Music (Admin. by Curb Records)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [G]More love to Thee O Christ, [G]more love to Th[D]ee [G]Hear Thou the prayer I make [D]on bended k[G]nee [C]This is my [G]earnest plea [D]More love O C[Em]hrist to Thee [C]More love to T[G]hee [D]More love to [G]Thee
Verse 2: [G]Once earthly joy I craved [G]sought peace and r[D]est [G]Now Thee alone I seek, [D]give what is [G] best [C]This all my prayer shall be [D]More love O C[Em]hrist to Thee [C]More love to T[G]hee [D]More love to T[G]hee
Verse 3: [G]Then shall my latest breath [G]whisper Thy p[D]raise [G]This be the parting cry [D]my heart shall r[G]aise [C]This still my p[G]rayer shall be [D]More love O C[Em]hrist to Thee [C]More love to T[G]hee [D]More love to T[G]hee
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 more love to thee o christ more love to thee hear thou the prayer i make on bended knee this is my earnest plea more love o christ to thee more love to thee more love to thee verse 2 once earthly joy i craved sought peace and rest now thee alone i seek give what is best this all my prayer shall be more love o christ to thee more love to thee more love to thee verse 3 then shall my latest breath whisper thy praise this be the parting cry my heart shall raise this still my prayer shall be more love o christ to thee more love to thee more love to thee

Arrangement.description: Medley with More Love, More Power
Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [G]More love to Thee O Christ, [G]more love to Th[D]ee [G]Hear Thou the prayer I make [D]on bended k[G]nee [C]This is my [G]earnest plea [D]More love O C[Em]hrist to Thee [C]More love to T[G]hee [D]More love to [G]Thee
VERSE: [Em] More love, [Cmaj7] more power [D] More of [Bm7]You in my[Em] life. [D] [Em] More love, [Cmaj7] more power [D] More of [Bm7]You in my[Em] life.
CHORUS: I will worship [Am7]You with all of my [Em]heart, I will worship [Am7]You with all of my [Em]mind, I will worship [Am7]You with all of my st[Em]rength, For you are my [Cmaj7]Lord. [Bm7]
ENDING: You are my [Cmaj7]Lord [D] You are my [Em]Lord. [Cmaj7 | D Bm7 | Em | Emaj |]
{new_page} {key:A} Verse 2: [A]Once earthly joy I craved [A]sought peace and r[E]est [A]Now Thee alone I seek, [E]give what is [A] best [D]This all my prayer shall be [E]More love O C[F#m]hrist to Thee [D]More love to T[A]hee [E]More love to T[A]hee
